Class AutomationSecretResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • keywhiz.service.resources.automation.AutomationSecretResource
  • Deprecated. 
    Will be removed in a future release. Migrate to SecretResource.

 @Path(value="/automation/secrets")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class AutomationSecretResource
extends Object
